title: Phoenix Lights
subtitle: Mass Sighting Event
overview: One of the most witnessed UFO sightings in history. Thousands of people across Arizona witnessed a massive V-shaped craft with lights spanning nearly a mile, silently gliding over Phoenix. The event was witnessed by the Governor, police officers, pilots, and thousands of civilians.

timeline.title: First Reports
timeline.description: Initial sightings reported in Henderson, Nevada

timeline.title: Phoenix Approach
timeline.description: Craft observed approaching Phoenix metropolitan area

timeline.title: Mass Sighting
timeline.description: Thousands witness craft passing directly over Phoenix

timeline.title: Second Wave
timeline.description: Additional lights observed, later claimed as flares by military

witnesses.name: Fife Symington
witnesses.testimony: I witnessed a massive delta-shaped craft silently navigate over Squaw Peak. It was truly breathtaking.

witnesses.name: Dr. Lynne Kitei
witnesses.testimony: I observed amber orbs that moved with intelligent purpose. This was not flares or conventional aircraft.

title: Roswell Incident
subtitle: The Original Cover-Up
overview: A rancher discovered mysterious debris scattered across his property. The military initially announced recovery of a 'flying disc' before quickly changing the story to a weather balloon. Witnesses reported seeing alien bodies. This incident sparked decades of conspiracy theories.

timeline.title: Crash Discovery
timeline.description: Rancher Mac Brazel discovers debris field

timeline.title: Military Notified
timeline.description: Brazel reports findings to Sheriff Wilcox

timeline.title: Press Release
timeline.description: Army announces recovery of flying disc

timeline.title: Retraction
timeline.description: Story changed to weather balloon

witnesses.name: Jesse Marcel
witnesses.testimony: The material was nothing from this Earth. It had properties unlike anything I had ever seen.

title: Rendlesham Forest
subtitle: Britain's Roswell
overview: US Air Force personnel stationed at RAF Woodbridge witnessed unexplained lights descending into nearby Rendlesham Forest. Deputy Base Commander Lt. Col. Charles Halt led an investigation and recorded observations on audio tape. Physical evidence included radiation readings and landing marks.

timeline.title: Initial Contact
timeline.description: Security patrol observes lights descending into forest

timeline.title: Ground Investigation
timeline.description: Team enters forest, encounters triangular craft

timeline.title: Return Visit
timeline.description: Lt. Col. Halt leads second investigation, records observations

witnesses.name: Charles Halt
witnesses.testimony: I saw a red sun-like light moving through the trees. It appeared to drip molten metal.

title: USS Nimitz Tic Tac
subtitle: Pentagon Confirmed UAP
overview: Navy pilots from USS Nimitz encountered a white, tic-tac shaped object exhibiting capabilities far beyond known technology. The object demonstrated instantaneous acceleration, hypersonic speeds without visible propulsion, and the ability to descend from 80,000 feet to sea level in seconds.

timeline.title: Radar Contact
timeline.description: USS Princeton tracks multiple anomalous objects

timeline.title: Visual Contact
timeline.description: F/A-18 pilots intercept and observe Tic Tac object

timeline.title: Pursuit
timeline.description: Object accelerates beyond aircraft capability

timeline.title: Reappearance
timeline.description: Object appears at CAP point 60 miles away

witnesses.name: David Fravor
witnesses.testimony: It accelerated like nothing I've ever seen. This was beyond any technology we possess.

title: Belgian UFO Wave
subtitle: Triangular Craft Over Europe
overview: Over 13,500 people reported sightings of large, silent, triangular craft over Belgium. F-16 fighters were scrambled and tracked the objects on radar. The Belgian Air Force officially acknowledged the sightings and released their findings.

timeline.title: First Reports
timeline.description: Police officers observe triangular craft with lights

timeline.title: Mass Sightings
timeline.description: Hundreds of calls flood emergency services

timeline.title: F-16 Scramble
timeline.description: Belgian Air Force intercepts radar contacts

witnesses.name: Wilfried De Brouwer
witnesses.testimony: We have no explanation for what our pilots and radar systems detected.

title: Ariel School Encounter
subtitle: 62 Children Witness Landing
overview: 62 schoolchildren at Ariel School witnessed a silver craft land near their playground. Small beings with large eyes emerged and communicated telepathically, warning about environmental destruction. The children's accounts remained consistent over decades.

timeline.title: Craft Appears
timeline.description: Children observe silvery object descending

timeline.title: Landing
timeline.description: Craft lands approximately 100 meters from school

timeline.title: Contact
timeline.description: Beings emerge and approach children

timeline.title: Departure
timeline.description: Craft ascends rapidly and disappears

witnesses.name: Emily Trim
witnesses.testimony: They had huge eyes. They told me the world is going to end if we don't take care of it.

title: Mexico City Eclipse UFOs
subtitle: Mass Sighting During Solar Event
overview: During a total solar eclipse, thousands of people across Mexico videotaped metallic objects hovering in the sky. Multiple independent videos from different locations showed similar craft, sparking a wave of UFO interest across Latin America.

timeline.title: Eclipse Begins
timeline.description: Total solar eclipse visible across Mexico

timeline.title: Objects Appear
timeline.description: Metallic objects spotted near obscured sun

timeline.title: Mass Recording
timeline.description: Thousands capture footage on video cameras

witnesses.name: Jaime Maussan
witnesses.testimony: We collected over 15 independent videos showing the same objects from different angles.

title: Japan Airlines Flight 1628
subtitle: Giant Mothership Encounter
overview: A Japan Airlines cargo flight was followed by unidentified objects for 50 minutes over Alaska. Captain Kenju Terauchi reported seeing a massive mothership, estimated to be the size of two aircraft carriers. FAA radar confirmed unidentified targets.

timeline.title: First Contact
timeline.description: Crew observes two small craft with glowing lights

timeline.title: Mothership Appears
timeline.description: Massive object detected, dwarfing the 747

timeline.title: FAA Radar
timeline.description: Anchorage control confirms radar contact

timeline.title: Objects Depart
timeline.description: Craft disappear as flight approaches Fairbanks

witnesses.name: Kenju Terauchi
witnesses.testimony: It was a spaceship, at least twice the size of an aircraft carrier. It followed us for 50 minutes.

title: Stephenville Lights
subtitle: Texas Mass Sighting
overview: Dozens of residents in Stephenville witnessed a large, silent object with bright lights moving at high speed. Some described it as a mile wide. Military jets were seen pursuing the object. The Air Force initially denied activity, then admitted F-16s were in the area.

timeline.title: Object Appears
timeline.description: Multiple witnesses observe large craft with lights

timeline.title: Military Pursuit
timeline.description: F-16 jets observed following the object

timeline.title: Rapid Departure
timeline.description: Object accelerates to extreme speed and vanishes

witnesses.name: Steve Allen
witnesses.testimony: It was about a mile wide and half a mile tall. Totally silent, with incredibly bright lights.

title: Operation Saucer
subtitle: Brazilian Military Investigation
overview: Residents of Colares Island reported being attacked by bright lights that left burn marks and drew blood. The Brazilian Air Force launched Operation Saucer to investigate. Over 400 photographs and hours of footage were collected. Dozens of people showed physical injuries.

timeline.title: Attacks Begin
timeline.description: Residents report being struck by beams of light

timeline.title: Panic Spreads
timeline.description: Villagers flee, organize night watches

timeline.title: Military Arrives
timeline.description: Brazilian Air Force begins Operation Saucer

timeline.title: Operation Ends
timeline.description: Investigation concluded, files classified

witnesses.name: Captain UyrangÃª Hollanda
witnesses.testimony: We photographed the objects. They were real. People were genuinely injured.

title: Tehran UFO Incident
subtitle: Jet Interceptors Disabled
overview: Iranian Air Force F-4 Phantoms were scrambled to intercept a brilliant UFO over Tehran. When pilots attempted to fire on the object, their weapons systems jammed. A smaller object detached and pursued one jet. The incident was documented in a US Defense Intelligence Agency report.

timeline.title: Civilian Reports
timeline.description: Residents report bright object in sky

timeline.title: First Intercept
timeline.description: F-4 Phantom scrambled, instruments fail

timeline.title: Second Intercept
timeline.description: Second F-4 attempts weapons lock, systems jam

timeline.title: Object Departs
timeline.description: UFO accelerates and disappears

witnesses.name: General Parviz Jafari
witnesses.testimony: When I tried to launch a missile, my weapons panel went completely dead.

title: Hudson Valley Wave
subtitle: Boomerang Over New York
overview: Over several years, thousands of residents in New York's Hudson Valley reported seeing a massive boomerang-shaped craft with colored lights. The craft was often described as silent or emitting a low hum. Police switchboards were overwhelmed with calls.

timeline.title: Wave Begins
timeline.description: Initial sightings reported in Westchester County

timeline.title: Peak Activity
timeline.description: Thousands of sightings across the region

timeline.title: Wave Subsides
timeline.description: Sighting frequency decreases

witnesses.name: Dennis Sant
witnesses.testimony: It was as big as a football field. The lights were arranged in a V-shape.

title: Westall UFO Encounter
subtitle: 200 Witness School Landing
overview: Over 200 students and teachers at Westall High School witnessed a grey saucer-shaped craft descend into a nearby field, then ascend and fly away. Military personnel arrived quickly and warned witnesses not to discuss what they saw. Physical traces were found in the grass.

timeline.title: Object Appears
timeline.description: Students observe disc descending toward field

timeline.title: Landing
timeline.description: Craft lands in paddock, observed by crowd

timeline.title: Departure
timeline.description: Object ascends at high speed

timeline.title: Military Arrives
timeline.description: Officials cordon area, question witnesses

witnesses.name: Terry Peck
witnesses.testimony: We all saw it. It was real. Then they came and told us never to talk about it.

title: Shag Harbour Incident
subtitle: Canada's Roswell
overview: Multiple witnesses observed a large object with flashing lights crash into the waters of Shag Harbour. Rescue operations were launched, but only yellow foam was recovered. Declassified documents reveal military divers were deployed and detected an object underwater.

timeline.title: Object Observed
timeline.description: Residents see object with lights descending

timeline.title: Impact
timeline.description: Object crashes into harbor waters

timeline.title: Rescue Launched
timeline.description: Coast Guard and RCMP respond

timeline.title: Dive Operations
timeline.description: Military divers conduct underwater search

witnesses.name: Laurie Chicken
witnesses.testimony: We saw four lights about 60 feet long hit the water. There was a light on the water for a while after.

title: Washington D.C. UFO Flap
subtitle: UFOs Over the Capital
overview: Over two consecutive weekends, UFOs were detected on radar and visually observed over Washington D.C., including restricted airspace over the White House and Capitol. F-94 jets were scrambled. The incident sparked the largest Pentagon press conference since WWII.

timeline.title: Radar Contact
timeline.description: Washington National Airport detects unknown targets

timeline.title: Visual Confirmation
timeline.description: Pilots observe bright lights

timeline.title: Second Wave
timeline.description: Objects return, jets scrambled again

witnesses.name: Edward Nugent
witnesses.testimony: I saw seven objects on radar. They were doing speeds of up to 7,200 mph.

title: Height 423 Encounter
subtitle: Soviet Military Encounter
overview: Soviet military personnel at a missile test range observed a disc-shaped object hovering near Height 423. The object emitted beams of light that appeared to scan the ground. Multiple soldiers observed the event over several hours.

timeline.title: Object Appears
timeline.description: Guards observe luminous disc approaching

timeline.title: Scanning
timeline.description: Object emits beams toward ground installations

timeline.title: Departure
timeline.description: Object ascends and disappears

witnesses.name: Military Personnel
witnesses.testimony: The disc hovered silently. Its lights seemed to probe our equipment.

title: Varginha UFO Incident
subtitle: Brazilian Roswell
overview: Three young women encountered a strange creature with brown skin, large red eyes, and a strong ammonia smell. Reports emerged of military capture of similar beings and a crashed craft. A soldier who allegedly handled one of the creatures died under mysterious circumstances.

timeline.title: Creature Spotted
timeline.description: Three girls encounter being near empty lot

timeline.title: Military Activity
timeline.description: Unusual military presence reported

timeline.title: Hospital Reports
timeline.description: Injured creature allegedly brought to hospital

witnesses.name: Liliane FÃ¡tima
witnesses.testimony: It was squatting against the wall. It had huge red eyes and oily brown skin.

title: Skinwalker Ranch
subtitle: Paranormal Hotspot
overview: A 512-acre property in Utah known for decades of unexplained phenomena including UFO sightings, cattle mutilations, poltergeist activity, and interdimensional portals. The ranch was purchased for scientific study by billionaire Robert Bigelow, then later acquired by Brandon Fugal.

timeline.title: Sherman Family
timeline.description: New owners experience intense phenomena

timeline.title: NIDS Study
timeline.description: Robert Bigelow purchases ranch for research

timeline.title: New Ownership
timeline.description: Brandon Fugal acquires property

timeline.title: TV Series
timeline.description: History Channel documents ongoing research

witnesses.name: Terry Sherman
witnesses.testimony: We saw portals open in the sky. Animals came through that weren't from here.

title: Kecksburg UFO Crash
subtitle: The Acorn Object
overview: A fireball was seen across six US states and Canada before something crashed in the woods near Kecksburg. Witnesses described an acorn-shaped object with hieroglyphic-like writing. The military cordoned the area and removed an object on a flatbed truck.

timeline.title: Fireball Observed
timeline.description: Object seen across multiple states

timeline.title: Impact
timeline.description: Object crashes in Kecksburg woods

timeline.title: Military Arrives
timeline.description: Area cordoned off by Army units

timeline.title: Removal
timeline.description: Object loaded onto flatbed and removed

witnesses.name: Bill Bulebush
witnesses.testimony: The military was everywhere. They took something out of those woods on a flatbed truck.

title: GIMBAL UAP Video
subtitle: Pentagon Released Footage
overview: Navy pilots recorded infrared footage of a rotating, disc-shaped object with no visible means of propulsion. The video, officially released by the Pentagon, shows the object defying conventional aerodynamics. Pilots can be heard expressing amazement at the object's capabilities.

timeline.title: Detection
timeline.description: Object tracked on radar and FLIR

timeline.title: Recording
timeline.description: Pilots capture infrared footage

timeline.title: Leak
timeline.description: Video leaked to New York Times

timeline.title: Official Release
timeline.description: Pentagon officially releases footage

witnesses.name: Navy Pilots
witnesses.testimony: There's a whole fleet of them! Look at that thing! It's rotating!
